buttons.signup: Don't have an account? Sign Up

resetDialog.text:
You are about to request a password reset url to your registered e-mail address. Your
e-mail needs to be verified for the request to be sent. If you haven't verified your
e-mail please contact the support if you can't login.
resetDialog.title: Reset password?

snackbar.error: General server error. Please try again
snackbar.failed: Failed to log in. Please try again.
snackbar.successReset: Sent password reset mail. Check your inbox.
snackbar.unverified: Your mail address isn't verified. Contact support.
snackbar.wrongMail: No account with provided mail address.
